controversies: Kerala government case in India highlighting data misuse risks
Recent downgrades by JP Morgan and Scotiabank reflecting investor skepticism
environmental_issues: Commitment to reducing carbon footprint and promoting sustainable practices
social_issues: Challenges in attracting and retaining top talent
governance_issues: Data privacy and regulatory compliance risks
